casebody.data:
ESTATE OF Regina Cecylia JOHNSON
v.
FUNDACJA JASMIN REGINY ELANDT I NORMANA LLOYDA JOHNSONOW, Ewa Violetta Elandt-Jankowska, Lech Henryk Jankowska, and Hanna Elandt-Pogodzinska No. 48P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2017 John M. Kirby, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Johnson, Regina Cecylia (Estate of). Elizabeth D. Scott, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Charles Steel, IV, Attorney at Law, for Johnsonow, Fundacja Jasmin Reginy Elandt i Normana LLoyda, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 3rd of February 2017 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2017."

Morgan, J. recused
